text:
An interview for recruitment of noon-meal organisers and assistants will be held on February 25.

In a release here on Saturday, K. Nandakumar, Collector, said the interview would be held at three centres – Collector’s Office and offices of Joint Registrar of Cooperative Societies and Joint Director of Agriculture.

The candidates should bring original certificates.

Holiday tomorrow

The district administration has declared a holiday for all government offices and educational institutions on February 22 for Mahamagam. In a release on Saturday, T. Karikalan, District Collector, said that February 27 will be a compensatory working day.
title: Interview for non-meal organisers
